Posts.Content: Jen53 wrote: I am unsure about my quality of life with chemo and radiation. I gather my prospects aren't really good and should I have a good couple of months or do chemo etc and extend my life by (I don't know) how much? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed stage 4 Jen53 awjkej

Posts.Content: Jan 23, 2008 12:28PM Jen53 wrote: I have been diagnosed with stage 4 BC, metastasised into bone (extensive) and liver tumours. I don't know whether it is better to not do anything and live life for a shorter time but better quality or do all the chemo, radiation etc and live longer but suffer much more. Its not as if I'm going to survive it. Can anyone advise me with their decision making ideas.
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed stage 4 Jen53 awjkej
